mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_ENROLLED_AT , A.MEMBER_WITHDRAWN_AT , A.MEMBER_STATUS , A.USER_ID , A.GROUP_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } ORDER BY A.MEMBER_ID
